user-story.name: F6333-Establish Operational Audit Functionality - June Release.feature

tag.name: F6333-Establish Operational Audit Functionality - June Release.feature

test-group.name: Given User logs with "iht_ittest05" as CPT ICD RA into JBPM Application
When User should be able click on CPTICDLink-Admin under Adminstration Section
Then Screen will be opened in a new tab with title CPTICD Links- Admin
When User clicks on the "TargetData" tab

test-step.description: Then Screen will be opened in a new tab with title CPTICD Links- Admin
When User clicks on the "TargetData" tab
And User Sort "DOS From" in the TargetData tab
Then User should be able to sort "DOS From" in the TargetData tab

test-step.description: Then Screen will be opened in a new tab with title CPTICD Links- Admin
When User clicks on the "TargetData" tab
And User Sort "DOS To" in the TargetData tab
Then User should be able to sort "DOS To" in the TargetData tab
